Comment: This was a 5-minute blitz game, played offline at my home. I can play so badly sometimes--yes, I am Black in this one.
Philidor Defense. It's solid but passive and rarely played at the highest levels. I would never play this on GameKnot.

The most common move, and probably best move.
I considered channeling the Allies who lost to Morphy at the Opera House (3...Bg4) but thought better of it. If only I thought better later. This move is called the Hanham variation.
I know there's some Philidor system with this move, but I sure didn't do it right!

I think this is the losing move, although I don't think Black's position is any good after 5...dxe5 either. It's just not salvageable now.
